xxl.core.io.raw

Class LoggerRawAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.io.raw.LoggerRawAccess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RawAccess

    public class LoggerRawAccess
extends Object
implements RawAccess
    This class writes a logfile for all accesses of a RawDevice.
